attributes.title: It grabbed me!
attributes.review: This app is promising.  Like a cup of hot covfefe, it is steamy and sweet. Yet... it leaves me wanting more. Specifically: a competent and moral leader.  Someone who loves his fellow citizens -all of them- more than his economy or his shot at re-election.  Someone who is not a division-sowing, anti-science fascist hoping we ignore our climbing death toll and his increasing tendencies towards authoritarianism.  Someone who doesn‚Äôt rule via executive tweet.

I‚Äôm glad sprint offer a 1 month window to return your phone!  Wasn‚Äôt expecting this to happen tho. üò§üò°
